name: My Escort Company
description:
WELCOME TO THE CITY!

HIRE, TRAIN, ESCORT & FUCK 10 WAIFUS!

My Escort Company is a management game where you create your company, make money and hire girls!

FEATURES!

Meet 10 gorgeous babes ready to work, train and do lewd things for you!
Start with the girl you want between Aki (left), Hayami (middle) and Rini (right) and then manage them as you want.

#1 Make your girl work to earn money.
#2 Train them to improve their performance.
#3 Rest them to recover energy.
#4 Use the money generated to hire more girl, unlock new areas and places, upgrade your company with bonuses.
#5 Manage your girl wisely to be more efficient and unlock 42 naughty elements per girl including 18 naughty strip cutscenes, 10 kink videos and various poses/outfits PER GIRL. In total, 400+ lewd elements to unlock!
Translation system: super experimental community made translation!

EXTRA: Meet the amazing KimmySun! Our special guest and your advisor in game!
